node.excerpt: This blog template is designed for web developers. Whether you're a professional web developer or are just getting started in the world of web development, this Gatsby starter is ready to go, right…
node.html: This blog template is designed for web developers. Whether you're a professional web developer or are just getting started in the world of web development, this Gatsby starter is ready to go, right out the of box. Its minimalist design makes it easy to tailor to your needs. But, you'll definitely want to make use of the tech tags and developer social media links, and maybe even make some of your own.

frontmatter.title: Welcome To My Web Developer Blog
